byline.contributor: Jonathan Soble reported from Tokyo, and David E. Sanger from Washington. Gardiner Harris contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By JONATHAN SOBLE and DAVID E. SANGER

headline.print_headline: Prime Minister, in a First for a Sitting Japanese Leader, Will Visit Pearl Harbor
headline.main: Shinzo Abe to Become First Japanese Leader to Visit Pearl Harbor

snippet: Mr. Abe’s trip this month to the site his country attacked 75 years ago will in effect be reciprocating a visit by President Obama to Hiroshima this year....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Abe’s trip this month to the site his country attacked 75 years ago will in effect be reciprocating a visit by President Obama to Hiroshima this year.
